version_description:
- fixed crash on log in for some users
- minor bug fixes and improvements

- Fixed reported crashes
- Updated team builder logic
- Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Fixed issue with display of player scores on Classic Team page

- Updates to C/VC logic in Classic game
- Updated emergency logic in Draft game
- Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

New brand
Redesigned interface
Updated salary cap and squad sizes
New open bench and auto-emergency rules
NRL Account sign-in
Adjusted league defaults, scoring and trading
Plenty more good stuff

New brand
Redesigned interface
Updated salary cap and squad sizes
New open bench and auto-emergency rules
NRL Account sign-in
Adjusted league defaults, scoring and trading
Plenty more good stuff
Bug fixes
We are continually providing updates to the app to improve your NRL Fantasy experience. Keep your eye out for more updates and functionality coming soon, both before and after the season starts

Please make sure you update your app so you are ready for the start of the NRL Fantasy season!
Update includes functionality for:

- Scoring
- Fixtures
- Ladders
- Matchups
- Rankings
- Trades
- Draft FA Requests

Don’t worry if you can’t see all of this functionality yet as some of it won’t become available till after round 1 when lockout has been lifted.
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fix and improvements
Bug fix and improvements
This update brings bugfixes and a number of improvements including an in-app Match Centre and the ability to make team-to-team trades in Draft via the app.
This update includes a number of improvements and bug fixes. More improvements coming soon.

This release includes a number of bug fixes and improvements including:
- Upgraded Stats Centre including comprehensive Coach stats
- Full Player Profiles including comprehensive Coach stats (accessible via the player mini profiles)
- The ability to swipe back to view past round scores on My Team
- A Game Bar on My Team that shows live match scores and links to the Match Centre (swipe it left from the top right of My Team)
- Updates to Head to Head Matchups
- A number of other improvements
This update brings further improvements and bug fixes
This update includes a number of bug fixes and improvements
This update includes a number of bug fixes and improvements
NRL Fantasy is back for the 2019 season. We've updated the salary cap and player prices, added more useful data and worked on the performance of the app.
Live draft minor bug fixes & improvements

- Team to Team trading now open
- Live scoring updates
- Fantasy News available in the App
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Fixed players who have not played yet, who had restriction from being removed or replaced with a player from the player pool
- Fixed live players appearing as DNP until the time they begin to score

- Match-ups for current round fixed
- Display on trade button corrected to 'T'
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Update to player status icons
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Updates to projected score display across screens
- Crash fixes and improvements
Minor updates and improvements

2020 Updates include:

- Salary Cap updated to $9.8M
- New 20/40 kicks added to existing 40/20 scoring
- Extra trades moved from R14 to R15
- Judiciary iconography added (to separate from casualty)
- Default league settings changed to: Start R1 and League finals from R22
- Average minutes and trade in / out stats added
- Updated readability of player scores
- Added NRL Fantasy Hall of Fame imagery
- More

- Minor updates and crash fixes
- Live scoring display updates
- Search function on PDL

- Fixed crash on Double Trade
- Minor bug fixes and updates

- Fixed display of previous round scores which included traded in player
- Live scores in match centre fixed
- Fixed avg points per round calculation on rankings page
- Crash fixes

- Corrected voice over trading issue
- Minor fixes and improvements
Crash fixes and improvements
Fixed missing rd 12 in draft league ladders
Minor bugfixes and improvements

- Update of forward positions to MID & EDG
- Turnover stat category added to scoring
- 2-pt field goal added
- Default league settings changed to: H2H grand final in R24
- Maximum draft teams = 5

- Monthly Rankings
- Fixed team scrolling issue
- Updates in preparation for season start
Bugfixes and improvements

- Fixed C & VC doubling in matchups
- Crash fixes and minor improvements
- Crash fixes and minor improvements
